articles.content: Much like the potential upgrade path from the Pixel 4 series to the Pixel 5, suggesting that someone shoul09d “upgrade” from the Pixel 3a to the Pixel 4a is a bit silly. Despite maybe being a little … [+10938 chars]

articles.title: $1 OnePlus Buds sell out within seconds - Android Police
articles.description: Yesterday, OnePlus got us all hot and bothered with the promise of $1 OnePlus buds in a flash sale today. Well, that sale started at 11 a.m. Eastern time
articles.content:

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Madden NFL 21 overhauls gameplay with real-life data, but only on PS5 and Xbox Series X - Polygon
articles.description: Madden NFL 21 on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, launching Dec. 4, will bring five years’ worth of player-tracking data into the game to deliver more realistic movement and positioning for all 22 players on the field.
articles.content: Advanced player tracking, in real life, will deliver a stronger playing video game, developers say
